MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G82 postcode area of Dumbarton, affecting properties in Overtoun House and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.30am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the overhead line network at Middleton Farm and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible some via generator and by 10.30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.20am on Thursday 28th January 2021.
